TopicTitle: decouples crossfeed if there is a tank on both ends, even when crossfeed is set to off.

Articles.Content:
i have noticed this on some stages where im using side mounted engines. my upper stage fuel will be gone when i go to land on minmus. 

stack looks something like this:

parachute
pod
heatshield
tank -> spider(x3)
decoupler (crossfeed off)
tank
engine
decoupler
tank
engine

i think its the bottom most engine that's siphoning off the fuel. everything is staged correctly. i tried it ommitting the bottom stage and the problem went away, but when i built it back up to 3 stages it siphoned the gas again. engines and decouplers are staged separately.

Edited February 26, 2023 by Nuke
LIkely related to
